website_summaries.verdict: If your wardrobe dictates something more subtle than copper, consider this pewter-coated magnetic bracelet from Earth Therapy.
pros: Pewter-coated copper cuff features a masculine Celtic knot pattern
Six neodymium therapeutic magnets embedded in ends at wrists for more than 15,000G induction
doesn't look like a therapeutic bracelet
cons: Pewter coating can wear off the bracelet

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic strength is incorrect.
customer_reviews.text: I own another magnet bracelet that's 3000 Gauss and I can tell you it is 3 times stronger than this one. It is not 15000 Gauss I don't know how they figured that. Now I am stuck with it, because I learned after it arrived that they don't accept returns. Wonderful. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: bamit

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Did the like this bracelet at all. It is heavy, combursome and useless! On top of this, it cannot be returned. Nowhere on the page does it say this, but Amazom just told me that the manufacturer: Earth Therapy refuses return. This is false advertising and innacceptable. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: PapaChill

customer_reviews.title: All Around Great but the Color can be Misleading
customer_reviews.text: OK. Upfront, I can’t comment on pain relief. I didn’t buy it for that reason. I never have used magnets for pain. Everything about it in other aspects is great. Comfortable, light weight, and easy to adjust. My only complaint is that it isn’t what I’d call pewter and it definitely doesn’t look at all like the picture. It’s more of a silver. Look at my picture. I didn’t want something quite as bright because I didn’t want something that would draw too much attention. I’m not a flashy person. But I still wear it and wasn’t a deal breaker. Just know what you are getting. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Green wrist
customer_reviews.text: Started out good and I started to believe it did work. The outer layer of bracelet began to wear off then it began to irritate my skin. I took a break from wearing it and it cleared up. I gave it another try and the rash returned as well as turning my wrist green. The end of my man jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: omegas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about my bracelet!! I have Lyme disease and my knees hurt all the time and when I put the bracelet on by that afternoon my knees felt amazing, it was the first time in almost a year that I could go up and down steps without pain. I wear it every time I work. I have recommended it to all my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Kelby Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Causes rashes and skin irritations...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first, but then had issues with the bracelet turning my wrist green, and causing skin irritations... Not very happy with this product... There seems to be a coating that once it wears off renders it useless...
customer_reviews.author: Shopper B

customer_reviews.title: Will Order More
customer_reviews.text: Really good looking masculine bracelet. I play piano, and have to have some surgeries following me blowing up my hand with a mortar on the 4th! I’ve been wearing it now for 3 days, the first day my hand felt a little sore, and now I really can’t tell much per healing effects, but very nicely made bracelet regardless, will order more!
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: I really feel great wearing this bracelet
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I really feel great wearing this bracelet. I have a lot less pain and have a lot more energy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one I've ordered for my nephew and he loves it. Requested the same on after original purchase. He's a meat cutter/manager at a national grocery chain and wears it everyday. He says it helps with the arm pain that he used to agonize with on a daily basis!! Thanks and I'm sure we will be back again!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

It fits well and is not tight on the wrist or too loose. I ordered it on a 2 day delivery, and it came right on time for his birthday!

customer_reviews.title: Great looking Bracelet!!

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, good price. It makes by hand a little more fluid and looser, like a warm up without doing any movement. I could see it helping play an instrument with finger movements. I haven't done any long experiments but does do something. You can switch it hand to hand and feel the difference. The effect does go away when you take it off. You will probably want two. I did the off and on test with family and now they want some, so I'm buying more for Christmas gifts.

product_meta.title: Celtic Pewter Magnetic Healing Bracelet for Arthritis, Carpal Tunnel, and Joint Pain Relief – Adjustable Sizing - Sourced by USA Seller - Earth Therapy
product_meta.description: This arthritis bracelet is the perfect solution for any man seeking to alleviate pain from overuse, arthritis, carpal tunnel, muscle strains, and more. Men who enjoy both active and leisurely lifestyles alike have found copper bracelets a highly effective solution to to reduce some of their aches and pains associated with arthritis. The Celtic knot design is complementary to any gentleman's style without being loud or clashing with existing accessories.
feature_bullets: MASCULINE DESIGN: Rustic masculine celtic desgin that gives you a classy yet sophisticated look. Still provides you the pain reducing benefits of copper for issues such as arthitis and joint aches.

ONE SIZE FITS MOST WRISTS: Bracelet sizes at an adjustable 6.5 inches in diameter. Each bracelet comes packed in a luxurious velvet pouch making it an easy-to-wrap, beautiful gift for every occasion. Don’t miss out on the gift of the holiday season for your loved one.

EFFECTIVE AND NONINVASIVE: Benefit from magnetic therapy treatment instead of invasive OTC pills.  Earth Therapy copper magnetic bracelets can help to relieve Arthritis, Joint Pains, RSI, carpal tunnel, migraines, and fatigue. Start taking the steps you need to get back in control of your health.

RARE EARTH MAGNETS: Contains 6 authentic, high-quality, rare earth magnets delivering over 15,000 Gauss to fight pain and inflammation. Unlike other copper bracelets, we source only the finest grade magnetic alloy to eliminate toxins and improve oxygenation in the body.

WE STAND BEHIND OUR BRACELETS: Match your style with magnetic jewelry designed specifically for arthritis pain relief. If you’ve tried copper healing bracelets from Smarter Lifestyle, Rainso, Coppervast, and Viterou – be sure to try our uniquely crafted and designed magnetic healing bracelets for both men and women. We're so confident you'll love your Earth Therapy Bracelet, we offer a 60 day Full Satisfaction Money Back Guarantee.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
